str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural

str2: A temple, a shrine, that part of the temple where God himself resides. From a primary naio; a fane, shrine, temple.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

word: I will raise it up again.”
parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up. Probably akin to the base of agora; to waken, i.e. Rouse.
